results.title: [Polly Woodside mast]
results.brief_description: This short film shows the activity of the National Trust of Australia’s members associated with the placing of the mast on the Polly Woodside ship which the Trust is restoring as a historical article worthy of preservation.

results.title: [Pictures of France: Savoi]
results.brief_description: Celebrated glaciers, lakes, forests and mountains including Mont Blanc provide scenic grandeur in the province of Savoi. Steamers take visitors to the spa, on Lake Geneva to drink the water and enjoy the varied sports. Wonderful views and winter sports are enjoyed by mountain-climbers and visitors, especially on the teleferry and ski-tows.

results.title: [Opening Castlemaine market] [Magnetic Soundtrack]
results.creator_credit: Bendigo and Central Victoria Telecasters Ltd
results.brief_description: Victoria’s Castlemaine market was restored by the National Trust in the early 70’s. This film records segments of the opening ceremony speeches by Victorian Premier Rupert Hamer, Australia’s Governor General John Kerr and a representative from the National Trust. Includes interior and exterior footage of the restored market and part of a photographic exhibition tracing the history of the market and the region. NB: The first five minutes and the last two minutes of the film has a magnetic soundtrack. The segment in-between is silent.

results.title: [Melbourne Zoological Gardens]
results.brief_description: An observational documentary of the Melbourne Zoo. The film features the Zoo as a visitor attraction focusing on the interests of children. Children’s verbal observations form a large part of this otherwise non-narrated film. Various animals are shown in their enclosures and the film takes us on the Zoo train tour. Photography: Graeme Jackson and Philip Cordingley
results.description: An observational documentary of the Melbourne Zoo. The film features the Zoo as a visitor attraction focusing on the interests of children. results.title: [Life cycle of endamoeba histolytica]
results.brief_description: Microscopic appearance of cysts in various stages of development. Excystation - beginning of the ‘meta-cystic’ stage. Division of amoeba in ileum - ‘trophozoites’. Development of lesions caused by endamoeba histolytics. Illustration of an ulcerated colon.

results.title: [Events of 1935]
results.brief_description: Untitled newsreel footage of the 1935 Southport Flower Show in the UK showing various activities. Also includes scenes of the Southport Lawn Tennis Championships won by H. Ellsworth Vines and W.T. Tilden (USA), horse jumping events and the Birkdale Golf Club House.

results.title: [Diving]. Thrills on ice. Acrobatic marvels.
results.brief_description: A compilation of three cinemagazine items: 1. [Diving] No title: Diving at outdoor pool near Luna Park, St Kilda and from Prince’s Bridge, Melbourne city. 2. Thrills on ice: Ice skaters in performance at indoor ice rink (St Moritz, St Kilda?). 3. Acrobatic marvels: Demonstration by acrobats in parkland.
